nodes.name: _validateWormholeMessageEmitter
nodes.text: function_validateWormholeMessageEmitter(IWormhole.VMmemoryvm)internalview{require(vm.emitterAddress==bytes32(uint256(uint160(address(this)))),"WR: bad emitter address");require(vm.emitterChainId==otherLayerWormholeId(),"WR: bad emitter chain");require(vm.nonce>=nextValidNonce,"WR: old transaction");}
